metadata.name: King's Triumph
metadata.description:
The crash and scrape of iron on steel, the ragged shouts of the desperate, and a king rising above the rabble. This is war, and only one can triumph.

This is the first 1/1 in a series of images in a similar style, from a collection that I have spent over a year developing and perfecting. Each month, just one black and white SKETCH will be released, and just one full-color PAINTing. This sketch marks the beginning of the series, and is my first publicly available mint on Foundation.

Owners of a SKETCH will always have first dibs to buy the matching PAINT version of them, at the floor price of the PAINT collection, no bidding required.

After a 24 hour window, un-bought PAINTings will switch to open auction if the sketch owner does not claim them.
